snippet.title: Loot Rascals - Roguelike Strategy GAMEPLAY
snippet.description:
Loot Rascals is a cute, turn-based strategy roguelike from the makers of Hohokum. 

Subscribe: http://goo.gl/qw3Ac7

Check out our full video catalog: http://goo.gl/Cqt2cn
Visit our playlists: http://goo.gl/pM7TNe
Like Polygon on Facebook: https://goo.gl/GmkOs4
Follow Polygon on Twitter: http://goo.gl/cQfqrq
Read more at: http://www.polygon.com
